13.plot: Featuring Ragtime Comedian Don Burns, plus piano with Neville Dickie (UK), Jon Seiger (Rochester, NY), and Sue Keller (Cape Cod, MA). Filmed in Alexandria Bay, NY at the Bonnie Castle Resort on the Saint Lawrence Seaway.

cast.name: Band, A.C.S. Mardi Gras Spirit Brass

imdb.plot outline: Focusing on the exploration of Ragtime, the 1st music of America, which operated as the musical headwaters of Jazz, Blues, Swing, and Rock and Roll. Featuring seminars, concerts, and music festivals focused on Ragtime, and related old-time, stride, novelty, jazz, swing, and blues music forms performed live on Cape Cod and elsewhere. Drawing on the classic ragtime works of Scott Joplin, Joseph F. Lamb, and James Scott, as well as other popular and contemporary composers.
imdb.title: Ragtime And All That Jazz
akas: Ragtime And All That Jazz (United States)
plot: Focusing on the exploration of Ragtime, the 1st music of America, which operated as the musical headwaters of Jazz, Blues, Swing, and Rock and Roll. Featuring seminars, concerts, and music festivals focused on Ragtime, and related old-time, stride, novelty, jazz, swing, and blues music forms performed live on Cape Cod and elsewhere. Drawing on the classic ragtime works of Scott Joplin, Joseph F. Lamb, and James Scott, as well as other popular and contemporary composers.
